Equipment Actions.Action 1: Tail, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 11 Bludgeoning
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Tentacles, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 22 Slashing
Equipment Actions.Action 3: Beak, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 13 Piercing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Grick makes 2 attacks, one with its Tail and one with its Tentacles.  If the Tentacles attack hits, the Grick can make one Beak attack against the same target

Abilities.Ability 1: Stone Camouflage, The Grick has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain

Damage Resistances.Damage 1: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks
